titleStmt.title: A peaceable and friendly address to the non-conformists: written upon their desiring an act of toleration without the sacramental test.
titleStmt.author: Synge, Edward, 1659-1741.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the Post-Office-Coffee-House in Fish-Shamble Street, for John Foster ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland) Library.
